Articles.Content: Just a simple idea, a flag box, so that Kerbals can get more flags, so that in all-panet round trip missions, the crew can plant a flag on every planet. Just an idea
Forgive me if I'm wrong (and I could be!), but if you get back into the command pod, don't you get another flag anyway?

Forgive me if I'm wrong (and I could be!), but if you get back into the command pod, don't you get another flag anyway?

Correct. The Kerbals have vast numbers of flags in their command pod. VAST NUMBERS.

(i.e. unlimited)

(stick a fork in this thread, because baby, it's done)

Oh, whoops (Never had enough time to go back in and out of the capsule, because of my own stupidity)

Mods, please lock this thread.
